title: ‘Final Race of His Career’: Tour de France Organizer Says Mark Cavendish to Retire after Singapore Criterium
content:
Manxman has been vague about intentions, while Astana-Qazaqstan team indicates its position.

Read the full article at ‘Final Race of His Career’: Tour de France Organizer Says Mark Cavendish to Retire after Singapore Criterium on Velo.
